Pleased we’ve reached a deal to reopen the federal government & provide back pay to federal workers as Congress works to prioritize funding for border security. Over the next 3 weeks, I urge my colleagues to negotiate a constructive solution that will secure our nation's borders.

Thanks for stopping by, @repdinatitus, but I’m pretty confident the Wolf Pack will bounce back next year. @NevadaFootball still leads in all-time wins against @unlvfootball 27 to 17… I like those odds! #PackPride #BattleBorn

(2/2) Instead of working toward a deal that will actually reopen the gov, tonight’s show votes did nothing but add more fuel to the political fire, failing to solve the problem for the sake of a ‘win’ in the political arena. Read my full statement here: https://bit.ly/2CNmWwW

(1/2) I voted against tonight’s legislation because it’s not responsible to advance bills that have been deemed dead on arrival in the Senate, eliminate funding for border security, & cut millions of dollars for House-passed funding priorities unique to Western states like ours

Just voted in favor of the #USMCA trade deal, bipartisan legislation that will lead to freer markets, fairer trade, and increased export opportunities for America’s farmers, ranchers, entrepreneurs, and manufacturers. More here: https://bit.ly/2tvyoLy
A deal is a deal! I'm just hoping you're ready to sport #WolfPack blue next year! Go Pack! https://twitter.com/repdinatitus/status/1205571699300818944 …

#HR3 will actually result in fewer cures. In fact, the Council of Economic Advisers estimates it could kill upwards of 100 new drugs over the next decade. This why I support #HR19, legislation to advance #MORECURES for victims of devastating diseases. pic.twitter.com/vcb3NwGqM8

The House just passed #HR3, a partisan prescription drug bill that eliminates lifesaving cures while creating more government mandates. Instead, I supported #HR19, a bill that will lower drug costs, advance cures, & can be signed into law. More here: https://bit.ly/2qMjT5b

Tonight I joined a number of my colleagues in the House in support of the Farm Workforce Modernization Act, a responsible piece of legislation that would establish a new employment-based immigration program for agricultural workers. More here: https://bit.ly/2Elertj

Just voted in support of the #NDAA for FY20, a critical defense package that strengthens our national security, supports our brave men and women in uniform, veterans, and their families. Full statement here: https://bit.ly/2YDd2r2
A special thanks to the 3rd graders at Brown Elementary in #Reno for inviting me to read to them on super hero day. Thanks for having me! @WCSDTweet pic.twitter.com/citdPgAiXJ
